description: Zoom to a door, Yubaba`s hand beckoning, Chihiro running among shadowy spirits, a shot of Chihiro and Rin, Haku climbing stairs, Chihiro and Rin in the elevator, bouncing heads, Chihiro asking Yubaba for work and her name lifting off the paper, a shot of Kamaji, then Sen with water flowing off her, Yubaba lighting up her finger and Chihiro`s name lifting off the paper while Yubaba tells her her name is now Sen.
